+   <title>单词配对游戏 - WordSprout</title>
+   <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
+   <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.15.4/css/all.min.css">
+   <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/css/main.css">
+   <style>
+     .game-card {
+       width: 70px;
+       height: 90px;
+       position: relative;
+       transition: transform 0.6s;
+       transform-style: preserve-3d;
+       perspective: 1000px;
+       cursor: pointer;
+       margin: 5px;
+     }
+     
+     .game-card.flipped {
+       transform: rotateY(180deg);
+     }
+     
+     .game-card.matched {
+       transform: rotateY(180deg);
+       box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(44, 206, 137, 0.6);
+     }
+     
+     .game-card-inner {
+       position: relative;
+       width: 100%;
+       height: 100%;
+       border-radius: 10px;
+       box-shadow: 0 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
+     }
+     
+     .game-card-front, .game-card-back {
+       position: absolute;
+       width: 100%;
+       height: 100%;
+       backface-visibility: hidden;
+       border-radius: 10px;
+       display: flex;
+       align-items: center;
+       justify-content: center;
+     }
+     
+     .game-card-front {
+       background-color: #7363E8;
+       font-size: 24px;
+       color: white;
+     }
+     
+     .game-card-back {
+       background-color: white;
+       transform: rotateY(180deg);
+       padding: 5px;
+       display: flex;
+       align-items: center;
+       justify-content: center;
+       text-align: center;
+       font-weight: 500;
+     }
+     
+     .timer-container {
+       font-size: 18px;
+       font-weight: 600;
+     }
+     
+     .matched-pairs {
+       font-size: 16px;
+       font-weight: 500;
+     }
+     
+     /* 游戏完成弹窗 */
+     .game-complete-overlay {
+       position: fixed;
+       top: 0;
+       left: 0;
+       right: 0;
+       bottom: 0;
+       background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
+       display: flex;
+       align-items: center;
+       justify-content: center;
+       z-index: 1000;
+       display: none;
+     }
+     
+     .game-complete-card {
+       width: 85%;
+       max-width: 350px;
+       background: white;
+       border-radius: 20px;
+       padding: 30px 20px;
+       text-align: center;
+       box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
+     }
+   </style>
+ </head>
+ <body>
+   <div class="wx-container bg-light">
+     <!-- iPhone状态栏 -->
+     <div class="iphone-status-bar">
+       <div class="status-carrier">中国移动</div>
+       <div class="status-time">17:41</div>
+       <div class="status-icons">
+         <i class="fas fa-signal"></i>
+         <i class="fas fa-wifi"></i>
+         <div class="battery-icon">
+           <div class="battery-level"></div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+     
+     <div class="wx-page wx-fade-in">
+       <!-- 顶部标题栏 -->
+       <div class="wx-header rounded-b-2xl mb-4 relative">
+         <!-- 渐变背景装饰 -->
+         <div class="gradient-bg"></div>
+         
+         <div class="flex-none">
+           <a href="games.html" class="w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-gray-50 hover:bg-gray-100 transition duration-200">
+             <i class="fas fa-arrow-left text-gray-600"></i>
+           </a>
+         </div>
+         
+         <div class="title text-center flex-grow">
+           <h1 class="text-lg font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-pink-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent whitespace-nowrap mx-auto flex items-center justify-center">
+             <i class="fas fa-th text-blue-500 mr-1"></i>
+             单词配对游戏
+           </h1>
+         </div>
+         
+         <div class="flex-none w-8"></div>
+       </div>
+ 
+       <!-- 游戏信息区域 -->
+       <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
+         <div class="timer-container text-gray-700">
+           <i class="far fa-clock text-blue-500 mr-1"></i>
+           <span id="timer">00:00</span>
+         </div>
+         
+         <div class="matched-pairs text-gray-700">
+           <span id="matched-count">0</span> / <span id="total-pairs">8</span>
+           <i class="fas fa-link text-green-500 ml-1"></i>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 游戏主体区域 -->
+       <div class="wx-card mb-6">
+         <div id="game-board" class="flex flex-wrap justify-center">
+           <!-- 卡片将通过JavaScript动态生成 -->
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 游戏控制区域 -->
+       <div class="flex justify-between mb-4">
+         <button id="restart-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-outline scale-on-press">
+           <i class="fas fa-redo-alt mr-1"></i> 重新开始
+         </button>
+         
+         <button id="hint-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-primary scale-on-press">
+           <i class="far fa-lightbulb mr-1"></i> 提示 (3)
+         </button>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 游戏说明 -->
+       <div class="wx-card bg-blue-50 border border-blue-100">
+         <h3 class="font-medium mb-2">游戏规则</h3>
+         <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">
+           找出所有匹配的单词对。点击卡片翻转，找到英文单词和对应的中文意思。用最少的时间和尝试次数完成配对。
+         </p>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 游戏完成弹窗 -->
+       <div id="game-complete" class="game-complete-overlay">
+         <div class="game-complete-card">
+           <div class="w-20 h-20 bg-green-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
+             <i class="fas fa-trophy text-yellow-500 text-4xl"></i>
+           </div>
+           <h2 class="text-xl font-bold mb-2">恭喜!</h2>
+           <p class="text-gray-600 mb-4">你已完成所有单词配对</p>
+           
+           <div class="flex justify-between mb-4">
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">用时</div>
+               <div id="final-time" class="font-bold text-lg">00:45</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">尝试次数</div>
+               <div id="final-attempts" class="font-bold text-lg">12</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">得分</div>
+               <div id="final-score" class="font-bold text-lg">85</div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+           
+           <button id="next-level-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-primary w-full mb-3 scale-on-press">
+             下一关卡
+           </button>
+           <button id="replay-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-outline w-full scale-on-press">
+             再玩一次
+           </button>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- 底部导航 -->
+     <div class="fixed bottom-0 left-0 w-full nav-footer">
+       <div class="flex justify-around">
+         <a href="index.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-home"></i>
+           <span>首页</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="learning.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-book"></i>
+           <span>学习</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="games.html" class="active">
+           <i class="fas fa-gamepad"></i>
+           <span>游戏</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="profile.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-user"></i>
+           <span>我的</span>
+         </a>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ 
+   <script src="../assets/js/main.js"></script>
+   <script>
+     // 更新状态栏时间
+     function updateStatusTime() {
+       const now = new Date();
+       const hours = now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       const minutes = now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       document.querySelector('.status-time').textContent = `${hours}:${minutes}`;
+     }
+     
+     // 初始更新时间并设置定时器每分钟更新一次
+     updateStatusTime();
+     setInterval(updateStatusTime, 60000);
+     
+     // 单词数据（英文和中文配对）
+     const wordPairs = [
+       { english: "Apple", chinese: "苹果" },
+       { english: "Book", chinese: "书" },
+       { english: "Cat", chinese: "猫" },
+       { english: "Dog", chinese: "狗" },
+       { english: "Egg", chinese: "鸡蛋" },
+       { english: "Fish", chinese: "鱼" },
+       { english: "Girl", chinese: "女孩" },
+       { english: "Home", chinese: "家" }
+     ];
+     
+     // 游戏状态
+     let gameState = {
+       cards: [],
+       flippedCards: [],
+       matchedPairs: 0,
+       attempts: 0,
+       canFlip: true,
+       gameStarted: false,
+       gameTime: 0,
+       timerInterval: null,
+       hintsLeft: 3
+     };
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     function initGame() {
+       const gameBoard = document.getElementById('game-board');
+       gameBoard.innerHTML = '';
+       
+       // 重置游戏状态
+       gameState = {
+         cards: [],
+         flippedCards: [],
+         matchedPairs: 0,
+         attempts: 0,
+         canFlip: true,
+         gameStarted: false,
+         gameTime: 0,
+         timerInterval: null,
+         hintsLeft: 3
+       };
+       
+       // 更新UI
+       document.getElementById('matched-count').textContent = '0';
+       document.getElementById('timer').textContent = '00:00';
+       document.getElementById('hint-btn').innerHTML = `<i class="far fa-lightbulb mr-1"></i> 提示 (${gameState.hintsLeft})`;
+       
+       // 准备卡片数据
+       let cardData = [];
+       wordPairs.forEach(pair => {
+         cardData.push({
+           id: `english-${pair.english}`,
+           text: pair.english,
+           pairId: pair.english,
+           language: 'english'
+         });
+         cardData.push({
+           id: `chinese-${pair.english}`,
+           text: pair.chinese,
+           pairId: pair.english,
+           language: 'chinese'
+         });
+       });
+       
+       // 随机排序
+       cardData = shuffleArray(cardData);
+       gameState.cards = cardData;
+       
+       // 创建卡片元素
+       cardData.forEach(card => {
+         const cardElement = document.createElement('div');
+         cardElement.className = 'game-card';
+         cardElement.dataset.id = card.id;
+         cardElement.dataset.pairId = card.pairId;
+         
+         const cardInner = document.createElement('div');
+         cardInner.className = 'game-card-inner';
+         
+         const cardFront = document.createElement('div');
+         cardFront.className = 'game-card-front';
+         cardFront.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-question"></i>';
+         
+         const cardBack = document.createElement('div');
+         cardBack.className = 'game-card-back';
+         cardBack.textContent = card.text;
+         
+         cardInner.appendChild(cardFront);
+         cardInner.appendChild(cardBack);
+         cardElement.appendChild(cardInner);
+         
+         cardElement.addEventListener('click', () => flipCard(card.id));
+         gameBoard.appendChild(cardElement);
+       });
+     }
+     
+     // 卡片翻转
+     function flipCard(cardId) {
+       // 如果不能翻牌，则返回
+       if (!gameState.canFlip) return;
+       
+       // 获取卡片元素和数据
+       const cardElement = document.querySelector(`.game-card[data-id="${cardId}"]`);
+       const cardData = gameState.cards.find(card => card.id === cardId);
+       
+       // 如果卡片已经匹配或已经翻转，则返回
+       if (cardElement.classList.contains('matched') || gameState.flippedCards.includes(cardId)) {
+         return;
+       }
+       
+       // 如果游戏还没开始，则开始游戏和计时器
+       if (!gameState.gameStarted) {
+         startTimer();
+         gameState.gameStarted = true;
+       }
+       
+       // 翻转卡片
+       cardElement.classList.add('flipped');
+       gameState.flippedCards.push(cardId);
+       
+       // 如果翻了两张牌，则检查是否匹配
+       if (gameState.flippedCards.length === 2) {
+         gameState.attempts++;
+         const card1Id = gameState.flippedCards[0];
+         const card2Id = gameState.flippedCards[1];
+         const card1 = gameState.cards.find(card => card.id === card1Id);
+         const card2 = gameState.cards.find(card => card.id === card2Id);
+         
+         // 如果匹配成功
+         if (card1.pairId === card2.pairId && card1.language !== card2.language) {
+           const card1Element = document.querySelector(`.game-card[data-id="${card1Id}"]`);
+           const card2Element = document.querySelector(`.game-card[data-id="${card2Id}"]`);
+           
+           setTimeout(() => {
+             card1Element.classList.add('matched');
+             card2Element.classList.add('matched');
+             gameState.matchedPairs++;
+             document.getElementById('matched-count').textContent = gameState.matchedPairs;
+             gameState.flippedCards = [];
+             
+             // 检查是否完成所有配对
+             if (gameState.matchedPairs === wordPairs.length) {
+               endGame();
+             }
+           }, 500);
+         } else {
+           // 如果不匹配，则翻回去
+           gameState.canFlip = false;
+           setTimeout(() => {
+             document.querySelectorAll(`.game-card[data-id="${card1Id}"], .game-card[data-id="${card2Id}"]`).forEach(card => {
+               card.classList.remove('flipped');
+             });
+             gameState.flippedCards = [];
+             gameState.canFlip = true;
+           }, 1000);
+         }
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // 开始计时器
+     function startTimer() {
+       const timerElement = document.getElementById('timer');
+       const startTime = Date.now();
+       
+       gameState.timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
+         const currentTime = Date.now();
+         const elapsedTime = Math.floor((currentTime - startTime) / 1000);
+         gameState.gameTime = elapsedTime;
+         
+         const minutes = Math.floor(elapsedTime / 60).toString().padStart(2, '0');
+         const seconds = (elapsedTime % 60).toString().padStart(2, '0');
+         timerElement.textContent = `${minutes}:${seconds}`;
+       }, 1000);
+     }
+     
+     // 结束游戏
+     function endGame() {
+       clearInterval(gameState.timerInterval);
+       
+       // 计算得分（基于时间和尝试次数）
+       const baseScore = 100;
+       const timeDeduction = Math.min(Math.floor(gameState.gameTime / 5), 50);
+       const attemptsDeduction = Math.min(Math.floor((gameState.attempts - wordPairs.length) * 2), 30);
+       const finalScore = Math.max(baseScore - timeDeduction - attemptsDeduction, 10);
+       
+       // 更新完成弹窗
+       const minutes = Math.floor(gameState.gameTime / 60).toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       const seconds = (gameState.gameTime % 60).toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       document.getElementById('final-time').textContent = `${minutes}:${seconds}`;
+       document.getElementById('final-attempts').textContent = gameState.attempts;
+       document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = finalScore;
+       
+       // 显示完成弹窗
+       setTimeout(() => {
+         document.getElementById('game-complete').style.display = 'flex';
+       }, 1000);
+     }
+     
+     // 提示功能
+     function showHint() {
+       if (gameState.hintsLeft <= 0 || gameState.matchedPairs === wordPairs.length) {
+         return;
+       }
+       
+       // 找到未匹配的卡片对
+       const unmatchedPairs = [];
+       wordPairs.forEach(pair => {
+         const englishCard = gameState.cards.find(card => card.pairId === pair.english && card.language === 'english');
+         const chineseCard = gameState.cards.find(card => card.pairId === pair.english && card.language === 'chinese');
+         const englishElement = document.querySelector(`.game-card[data-id="${englishCard.id}"]`);
+         const chineseElement = document.querySelector(`.game-card[data-id="${chineseCard.id}"]`);
+         
+         if (!englishElement.classList.contains('matched')) {
+           unmatchedPairs.push({ english: englishCard, chinese: chineseCard });
+         }
+       });
+       
+       if (unmatchedPairs.length > 0) {
+         // 随机选择一对
+         const randomPair = unmatchedPairs[Math.floor(Math.random() * unmatchedPairs.length)];
+         const englishElement = document.querySelector(`.game-card[data-id="${randomPair.english.id}"]`);
+         const chineseElement = document.querySelector(`.game-card[data-id="${randomPair.chinese.id}"]`);
+         
+         // 临时翻转显示
+         englishElement.classList.add('flipped');
+         chineseElement.classList.add('flipped');
+         
+         setTimeout(() => {
+           if (!englishElement.classList.contains('matched')) {
+             englishElement.classList.remove('flipped');
+           }
+           if (!chineseElement.classList.contains('matched')) {
+             chineseElement.classList.remove('flipped');
+           }
+         }, 2000);
+         
+         // 减少提示次数
+         gameState.hintsLeft--;
+         document.getElementById('hint-btn').innerHTML = `<i class="far fa-lightbulb mr-1"></i> 提示 (${gameState.hintsLeft})`;
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // 辅助函数：随机打乱数组
+     function shuffleArray(array) {
+       const newArray = [...array];
+       for (let i = newArray.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
+         const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
+         [newArray[i], newArray[j]] = [newArray[j], newArray[i]];
+       }
+       return newArray;
+     }
+     
+     // 绑定按钮事件
+     document.getElementById('restart-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       initGame();
+     });
+     
+     document.getElementById('hint-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       showHint();
+     });
+     
+     document.getElementById('next-level-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       document.getElementById('game-complete').style.display = 'none';
+       // 这里可以添加下一关的逻辑
+       initGame();
+     });
+     
+     document.getElementById('replay-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       document.getElementById('game-complete').style.display = 'none';
+       initGame();
+     });
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+       initGame();
+     });
+   </script>
+ </body>
+ </html> 
```

---

现在已成功创建了单词配对游戏页面，接下来创建听力选择题游戏页面：

---

```diff
- 
+ <!DOCTYPE html>
+ <html lang="zh-CN">
+ <head>
+   <meta charset="UTF-8">
+   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, viewport-fit=cover">
+   <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes">
+   <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="black-translucent">
+   <title>听力选择 - WordSprout</title>
+   <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
+   <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.15.4/css/all.min.css">
+   <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/css/main.css">
+   <style>
+     .option-card {
+       transition: all 0.3s ease;
+       border: 2px solid transparent;
+     }
+     
+     .option-card:active {
+       transform: scale(0.98);
+     }
+     
+     .option-card.correct {
+       border-color: var(--success-color);
+       background-color: rgba(44, 206, 137, 0.1);
+     }
+     
+     .option-card.incorrect {
+       border-color: var(--error-color);
+       background-color: rgba(255, 75, 75, 0.1);
+     }
+     
+     .volume-btn {
+       width: 60px;
+       height: 60px;
+       border-radius: 50%;
+       background: linear-gradient(135deg, #7363E8, #A091FF);
+       box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.3);
+       transition: all 0.3s ease;
+     }
+     
+     .volume-btn:active {
+       transform: scale(0.95);
+       box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.2);
+     }
+     
+     .progress-container {
+       height: 10px;
+       background-color: #e9ecef;
+       border-radius: 10px;
+       overflow: hidden;
+     }
+     
+     .progress-bar {
+       height: 100%;
+       background: linear-gradient(to right, #7363E8, #A091FF);
+       border-radius: 10px;
+       transition: width 0.3s ease;
+     }
+     
+     /* 结果弹窗 */
+     .result-overlay {
+       position: fixed;
+       top: 0;
+       left: 0;
+       right: 0;
+       bottom: 0;
+       background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
+       display: flex;
+       align-items: center;
+       justify-content: center;
+       z-index: 1000;
+       display: none;
+     }
+     
+     .result-card {
+       width: 85%;
+       max-width: 350px;
+       background: white;
+       border-radius: 20px;
+       padding: 30px 20px;
+       text-align: center;
+       box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
+     }
+   </style>
+ </head>
+ <body>
+   <div class="wx-container bg-light">
+     <!-- iPhone状态栏 -->
+     <div class="iphone-status-bar">
+       <div class="status-carrier">中国移动</div>
+       <div class="status-time">17:41</div>
+       <div class="status-icons">
+         <i class="fas fa-signal"></i>
+         <i class="fas fa-wifi"></i>
+         <div class="battery-icon">
+           <div class="battery-level"></div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+     
+     <div class="wx-page wx-fade-in">
+       <!-- 顶部标题栏 -->
+       <div class="wx-header rounded-b-2xl mb-4 relative">
+         <!-- 渐变背景装饰 -->
+         <div class="gradient-bg"></div>
+         
+         <div class="flex-none">
+           <a href="games.html" class="w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-gray-50 hover:bg-gray-100 transition duration-200">
+             <i class="fas fa-arrow-left text-gray-600"></i>
+           </a>
+         </div>
+         
+         <div class="title text-center flex-grow">
+           <h1 class="text-lg font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-pink-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent whitespace-nowrap mx-auto flex items-center justify-center">
+             <i class="fas fa-volume-up text-purple-500 mr-1"></i>
+             听力选择
+           </h1>
+         </div>
+         
+         <div class="flex-none w-8"></div>
+       </div>
+ 
+       <!-- 游戏进度 -->
+       <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-3">
+         <div class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">
+           题目: <span id="current-question">1</span>/<span id="total-questions">10</span>
+         </div>
+         <div class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">
+           得分: <span id="score">0</span>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       <div class="progress-container mb-6">
+         <div id="progress-bar" class="progress-bar" style="width: 10%;"></div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 听力发音区域 -->
+       <div class="flex justify-center mb-6">
+         <button id="play-btn" class="volume-btn flex items-center justify-center">
+           <i class="fas fa-volume-up text-white text-2xl"></i>
+         </button>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 问题提示 -->
+       <div class="text-center mb-6">
+         <h3 class="text-gray-600 font-medium">听一听，选择你听到的单词</h3>
+         <p class="text-sm text-gray-500 mt-1">点击上方按钮播放发音</p>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 选项列表 -->
+       <div class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-6">
+         <div class="option-card wx-card p-4 flex items-center justify-center" data-option="0">
+           <span class="text-lg font-medium">选项 1</span>
+         </div>
+         <div class="option-card wx-card p-4 flex items-center justify-center" data-option="1">
+           <span class="text-lg font-medium">选项 2</span>
+         </div>
+         <div class="option-card wx-card p-4 flex items-center justify-center" data-option="2">
+           <span class="text-lg font-medium">选项 3</span>
+         </div>
+         <div class="option-card wx-card p-4 flex items-center justify-center" data-option="3">
+           <span class="text-lg font-medium">选项 4</span>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 提示区域 -->
+       <div id="hint-area" class="wx-card bg-blue-50 border border-blue-100 mb-4 hidden">
+         <div class="flex items-start">
+           <i class="fas fa-lightbulb text-yellow-500 mt-1 mr-2"></i>
+           <div>
+             <h3 class="font-medium mb-1">提示</h3>
+             <p id="hint-text" class="text-sm text-gray-600">
+               <!-- 提示内容将通过JavaScript动态生成 -->
+             </p>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 操作按钮 -->
+       <div class="flex justify-between">
+         <button id="hint-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-outline scale-on-press">
+           <i class="far fa-lightbulb mr-1"></i> 提示
+         </button>
+         
+         <button id="next-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-primary scale-on-press opacity-50 pointer-events-none">
+           下一题 <i class="fas fa-arrow-right ml-1"></i>
+         </button>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 结果弹窗 -->
+       <div id="result-popup" class="result-overlay">
+         <div class="result-card">
+           <div id="result-icon" class="w-20 h-20 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
+             <!-- 图标将根据得分动态生成 -->
+           </div>
+           <h2 class="text-xl font-bold mb-2">听力挑战完成!</h2>
+           <p class="text-gray-600 mb-4">你的得分：<span id="final-score" class="font-bold">0</span> / 100</p>
+           
+           <div class="flex justify-between mb-6">
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">正确</div>
+               <div id="correct-count" class="font-bold text-lg text-green-500">0</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">错误</div>
+               <div id="incorrect-count" class="font-bold text-lg text-red-500">0</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">准确率</div>
+               <div id="accuracy" class="font-bold text-lg">0%</div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+           
+           <button id="try-again-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-primary w-full mb-3 scale-on-press">
+             再玩一次
+           </button>
+           <a href="games.html" class="wx-button wx-button-outline w-full block scale-on-press">
+             返回游戏中心
+           </a>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- 底部导航 -->
+     <div class="fixed bottom-0 left-0 w-full nav-footer">
+       <div class="flex justify-around">
+         <a href="index.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-home"></i>
+           <span>首页</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="learning.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-book"></i>
+           <span>学习</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="games.html" class="active">
+           <i class="fas fa-gamepad"></i>
+           <span>游戏</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="profile.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-user"></i>
+           <span>我的</span>
+         </a>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ 
+   <script src="../assets/js/main.js"></script>
+   <script>
+     // 更新状态栏时间
+     function updateStatusTime() {
+       const now = new Date();
+       const hours = now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       const minutes = now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       document.querySelector('.status-time').textContent = `${hours}:${minutes}`;
+     }
+     
+     // 初始更新时间并设置定时器每分钟更新一次
+     updateStatusTime();
+     setInterval(updateStatusTime, 60000);
+     
+     // 游戏数据
+     const questions = [
+       {
+         word: "Apple",
+         translation: "苹果",
+         options: ["Apple", "Banana", "Orange", "Grape"],
+         correctIndex: 0,
+         hint: "这是一种常见的红色或绿色水果，经常用来形容老师的礼物。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Book",
+         translation: "书",
+         options: ["Pen", "Book", "Notebook", "Pencil"],
+         correctIndex: 1,
+         hint: "这是一种由纸张和文字组成的物品，用于阅读和学习。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Cat",
+         translation: "猫",
+         options: ["Dog", "Bird", "Cat", "Fish"],
+         correctIndex: 2,
+         hint: "这是一种常见的宠物，喜欢捉老鼠，会发出"喵喵"的叫声。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Dog",
+         translation: "狗",
+         options: ["Cat", "Dog", "Rabbit", "Hamster"],
+         correctIndex: 1,
+         hint: "这是人类最忠实的朋友，会发出"汪汪"的叫声。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Elephant",
+         translation: "大象",
+         options: ["Lion", "Tiger", "Giraffe", "Elephant"],
+         correctIndex: 3,
+         hint: "这是地球上最大的陆地动物，有长长的鼻子和大耳朵。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Flower",
+         translation: "花",
+         options: ["Flower", "Tree", "Grass", "Bush"],
+         correctIndex: 0,
+         hint: "这是植物的一部分，通常有美丽的颜色和香气，用于装饰或表达情感。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Giraffe",
+         translation: "长颈鹿",
+         options: ["Zebra", "Elephant", "Giraffe", "Hippo"],
+         correctIndex: 2,
+         hint: "这种动物有非常长的脖子，可以吃到高树上的叶子。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "House",
+         translation: "房子",
+         options: ["Car", "House", "Building", "Shop"],
+         correctIndex: 1,
+         hint: "这是人们生活的地方，有墙壁、门窗和屋顶。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Ice Cream",
+         translation: "冰淇淋",
+         options: ["Cake", "Candy", "Ice Cream", "Chocolate"],
+         correctIndex: 2,
+         hint: "这是一种冰冷的甜食，夏天特别受欢迎，有各种口味。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "Jungle",
+         translation: "丛林",
+         options: ["Jungle", "Desert", "Ocean", "Mountain"],
+         correctIndex: 0,
+         hint: "这是一种密集的森林环境，通常位于热带地区，有很多野生动物。"
+       }
+     ];
+     
+     // 游戏状态
+     let gameState = {
+       currentQuestion: 0,
+       score: 0,
+       correctCount: 0,
+       incorrectCount: 0,
+       answered: false,
+       hintsUsed: 0,
+       shuffledQuestions: []
+     };
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     function initGame() {
+       // 重置游戏状态
+       gameState = {
+         currentQuestion: 0,
+         score: 0,
+         correctCount: 0,
+         incorrectCount: 0,
+         answered: false,
+         hintsUsed: 0,
+         shuffledQuestions: shuffleArray([...questions])
+       };
+       
+       // 更新UI
+       document.getElementById('current-question').textContent = '1';
+       document.getElementById('total-questions').textContent = questions.length;
+       document.getElementById('score').textContent = '0';
+       document.getElementById('progress-bar').style.width = '10%';
+       
+       // 隐藏提示区域
+       document.getElementById('hint-area').classList.add('hidden');
+       
+       // 加载第一个问题
+       loadQuestion();
+     }
+     
+     // 加载问题
+     function loadQuestion() {
+       // 如果已经回答完所有问题，则显示结果
+       if (gameState.currentQuestion >= gameState.shuffledQuestions.length) {
+         showResults();
+         return;
+       }
+       
+       // 获取当前问题
+       const question = gameState.shuffledQuestions[gameState.currentQuestion];
+       
+       // 更新进度
+       document.getElementById('current-question').textContent = gameState.currentQuestion + 1;
+       document.getElementById('progress-bar').style.width = `${(gameState.currentQuestion + 1) / gameState.shuffledQuestions.length * 100}%`;
+       
+       // 随机排序选项
+       const shuffledOptions = shuffleArray([...question.options]);
+       
+       // 更新选项
+       const optionCards = document.querySelectorAll('.option-card');
+       optionCards.forEach((card, index) => {
+         // 重置选项卡样式
+         card.classList.remove('correct', 'incorrect');
+         card.querySelector('span').textContent = shuffledOptions[index];
+         
+         // 存储正确答案的索引
+         if (shuffledOptions[index] === question.options[question.correctIndex]) {
+           card.dataset.correct = 'true';
+         } else {
+           card.dataset.correct = 'false';
+         }
+       });
+       
+       // 重置答题状态
+       gameState.answered = false;
+       
+       // 禁用下一题按钮
+       const nextBtn = document.getElementById('next-btn');
+       nextBtn.classList.add('opacity-50', 'pointer-events-none');
+       
+       // 隐藏提示区域
+       document.getElementById('hint-area').classList.add('hidden');
+       
+       // 添加选项点击事件
+       optionCards.forEach(card => {
+         card.onclick = function() {
+           if (gameState.answered) return; // 如果已经回答，则不处理点击
+           
+           gameState.answered = true;
+           
+           // 判断是否正确
+           if (this.dataset.correct === 'true') {
+             this.classList.add('correct');
+             gameState.score += 10;
+             gameState.correctCount++;
+             document.getElementById('score').textContent = gameState.score;
+           } else {
+             this.classList.add('incorrect');
+             gameState.incorrectCount++;
+             
+             // 显示正确答案
+             optionCards.forEach(c => {
+               if (c.dataset.correct === 'true') {
+                 c.classList.add('correct');
+               }
+             });
+           }
+           
+           // 启用下一题按钮
+           nextBtn.classList.remove('opacity-50', 'pointer-events-none');
+         };
+       });
+       
+       // 更新提示文本
+       document.getElementById('hint-text').textContent = question.hint;
+     }
+     
+     // 显示结果
+     function showResults() {
+       // 计算准确率
+       const accuracy = Math.round((gameState.correctCount / gameState.shuffledQuestions.length) * 100);
+       
+       // 更新结果弹窗
+       document.getElementById('final-score').textContent = gameState.score;
+       document.getElementById('correct-count').textContent = gameState.correctCount;
+       document.getElementById('incorrect-count').textContent = gameState.incorrectCount;
+       document.getElementById('accuracy').textContent = `${accuracy}%`;
+       
+       // 根据得分设置不同的图标和颜色
+       const resultIcon = document.getElementById('result-icon');
+       if (accuracy >= 80) {
+         resultIcon.className = 'w-20 h-20 bg-green-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4';
+         resultIcon.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-trophy text-yellow-500 text-4xl"></i>';
+       } else if (accuracy >= 60) {
+         resultIcon.className = 'w-20 h-20 bg-blue-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4';
+         resultIcon.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-medal text-blue-500 text-4xl"></i>';
+       } else {
+         resultIcon.className = 'w-20 h-20 bg-yellow-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4';
+         resultIcon.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-star text-orange-500 text-4xl"></i>';
+       }
+       
+       // 显示结果弹窗
+       document.getElementById('result-popup').style.display = 'flex';
+     }
+     
+     // 播放发音
+     function playPronunciation() {
+       // 在实际应用中，这里会使用真实的发音API
+       // 在这个原型中，我们只是使用console输出
+       console.log(`播放单词：${gameState.shuffledQuestions[gameState.currentQuestion].word}`);
+       
+       // 添加音效反馈
+       const playBtn = document.getElementById('play-btn');
+       playBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-play text-white text-2xl"></i>';
+       
+       setTimeout(() => {
+         playBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-volume-up text-white text-2xl"></i>';
+       }, 1000);
+     }
+     
+     // 显示提示
+     function showHint() {
+       document.getElementById('hint-area').classList.remove('hidden');
+       gameState.hintsUsed++;
+     }
+     
+     // 辅助函数：随机打乱数组
+     function shuffleArray(array) {
+       const newArray = [...array];
+       for (let i = newArray.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
+         const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
+         [newArray[i], newArray[j]] = [newArray[j], newArray[i]];
+       }
+       return newArray;
+     }
+     
+     // 绑定按钮事件
+     document.getElementById('play-btn').addEventListener('click', playPronunciation);
+     
+     document.getElementById('hint-btn').addEventListener('click', showHint);
+     
+     document.getElementById('next-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       gameState.currentQuestion++;
+       loadQuestion();
+     });
+     
+     document.getElementById('try-again-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       document.getElementById('result-popup').style.display = 'none';
+       initGame();
+     });
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initGame);
+   </script>
+ </body>
+ </html> 
```

---

接下来创建拼写闯关游戏页面：

+     }
+   </style>
+ </head>
+ <body>
+   <div class="wx-container bg-light">
+     <!-- iPhone状态栏 -->
+     <div class="iphone-status-bar">

+         <i class="fas fa-signal"></i>

+         </div>

+     </div>

+       <!-- 顶部标题栏 -->

+             <i class="fas fa-arrow-left text-gray-600"></i>
+           </a>
+         </div>

+       <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-3">

+       <!-- 单词拼写区域 -->

+           <!-- 字母格将通过JavaScript动态生成 -->
+         </div>
+         
+         <!-- 翻译提示 -->
+         <div class="text-center text-gray-500 text-sm mb-2">
+           中文提示: <span id="translation">苹果</span>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 虚拟键盘 -->
+       <div class="mb-6">
+         <div class="keyboard-row">
+           <button class="key" data-key="Q">Q</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="W">W</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="E">E</button>

+           <button class="key" data-key="I">I</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="O">O</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="P">P</button>
+         </div>
+         <div class="keyboard-row">
+           <button class="key" data-key="A">A</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="S">S</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="D">D</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="F">F</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="G">G</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="H">H</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="J">J</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="K">K</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="L">L</button>
+         </div>
+         <div class="keyboard-row">
+           <button class="key" data-key="Z">Z</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="X">X</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="C">C</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="V">V</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="B">B</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="N">N</button>
+           <button class="key" data-key="M">M</button>
+           <button class="key wide" data-key="backspace">
+             <i class="fas fa-backspace"></i>
+           </button>
+         </div>
+         <div class="keyboard-row">
+           <button class="key" data-key=" ">空格</button>
+           <button id="submit-btn" class="key wide" data-key="submit" disabled>
+             <i class="fas fa-check"></i> 提交
+           </button>
+           <button id="hint-btn" class="key" data-key="hint">
+             <i class="far fa-lightbulb"></i>
+           </button>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 结果弹窗 -->
+       <div id="result-popup" class="result-overlay">
+         <div class="result-card">
+           <div id="result-icon" class="w-20 h-20 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
+             <!-- 图标将根据得分动态生成 -->
+           </div>
+           <h2 class="text-xl font-bold mb-2">拼写挑战完成!</h2>
+           <p class="text-gray-600 mb-4">你通过了 <span id="passed-levels" class="font-bold">0</span> 个关卡</p>
+           
+           <div class="flex justify-between mb-6">
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">正确</div>
+               <div id="correct-count" class="font-bold text-lg text-green-500">0</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">提示次数</div>
+               <div id="hints-used" class="font-bold text-lg text-yellow-500">0</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">准确率</div>
+               <div id="accuracy" class="font-bold text-lg">0%</div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+           
+           <button id="try-again-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-primary w-full mb-3 scale-on-press">
+             再挑战一次
+           </button>
+           <a href="games.html" class="wx-button wx-button-outline w-full block scale-on-press">
+             返回游戏中心
+           </a>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- 底部导航 -->
+     <div class="fixed bottom-0 left-0 w-full nav-footer">
+       <div class="flex justify-around">
+         <a href="index.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-home"></i>
+           <span>首页</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="learning.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-book"></i>
+           <span>学习</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="games.html" class="active">
+           <i class="fas fa-gamepad"></i>
+           <span>游戏</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="profile.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-user"></i>
+           <span>我的</span>
+         </a>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ 
+   <script src="../assets/js/main.js"></script>
+   <script>
+     // 更新状态栏时间
+     function updateStatusTime() {
+       const now = new Date();
+       const hours = now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       const minutes = now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       document.querySelector('.status-time').textContent = `${hours}:${minutes}`;
+     }
+     
+     // 初始更新时间并设置定时器每分钟更新一次
+     updateStatusTime();
+     setInterval(updateStatusTime, 60000);
+     
+     // 游戏数据
+     const levels = [
+       {
+         word: "APPLE",
+         translation: "苹果",
+         hint: "一种红色或绿色的水果，常被用来比喻老师的礼物。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "BOOK",
+         translation: "书",
+         hint: "用于阅读的物品，包含文字和知识。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "CAT",
+         translation: "猫",
+         hint: "一种常见的宠物，会发出"喵喵"的叫声。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "DOG",
+         translation: "狗",
+         hint: "人类最忠实的朋友，会发出"汪汪"的叫声。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "ELEPHANT",
+         translation: "大象",
+         hint: "地球上最大的陆地动物，有长长的鼻子。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "FLOWER",
+         translation: "花",
+         hint: "植物的一部分，通常有美丽的颜色和香气。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "GIRAFFE",
+         translation: "长颈鹿",
+         hint: "这种动物有非常长的脖子，可以吃到高树上的叶子。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "HOUSE",
+         translation: "房子",
+         hint: "人们生活的地方，有墙壁、门窗和屋顶。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "JUNGLE",
+         translation: "丛林",
+         hint: "一种密集的森林环境，通常位于热带地区。"
+       },
+       {
+         word: "KITE",
+         translation: "风筝",
+         hint: "一种可以在风中飞翔的玩具，用线控制。"
+       }
+     ];
+     
+     // 游戏状态
+     let gameState = {
+       currentLevel: 0,
+       lives: 3,
+       userInput: "",
+       correctCount: 0,
+       hintsUsed: 0,
+       shuffledLevels: []
+     };
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     function initGame() {
+       // 重置游戏状态
+       gameState = {
+         currentLevel: 0,
+         lives: 3,
+         userInput: "",
+         correctCount: 0,
+         hintsUsed: 0,
+         shuffledLevels: shuffleArray([...levels])
+       };
+       
+       // 更新UI
+       document.getElementById('current-level').textContent = '1';
+       document.getElementById('total-levels').textContent = levels.length;
+       document.getElementById('lives-count').textContent = gameState.lives;
+       document.getElementById('progress-bar').style.width = '10%';
+       
+       // 隐藏提示区域
+       document.getElementById('hint-bubble').classList.add('hidden');
+       
+       // 加载第一关
+       loadLevel();
+     }
+     
+     // 加载关卡
+     function loadLevel() {
+       // 如果已经完成所有关卡或生命值为0，则显示结果
+       if (gameState.currentLevel >= gameState.shuffledLevels.length || gameState.lives <= 0) {
+         showResults();
+         return;
+       }
+       
+       // 获取当前关卡
+       const level = gameState.shuffledLevels[gameState.currentLevel];
+       
+       // 重置用户输入
+       gameState.userInput = "";
+       
+       // 更新进度
+       document.getElementById('current-level').textContent = gameState.currentLevel + 1;
+       document.getElementById('progress-bar').style.width = `${(gameState.currentLevel + 1) / gameState.shuffledLevels.length * 100}%`;
+       
+       // 更新翻译提示
+       document.getElementById('translation').textContent = level.translation;
+       
+       // 创建字母框
+       createLetterBoxes(level.word.length);
+       
+       // 隐藏提示区域
+       document.getElementById('hint-bubble').classList.add('hidden');
+       
+       // 重置提交按钮状态
+       document.getElementById('submit-btn').disabled = true;
+     }
+     
+     // 创建字母框
+     function createLetterBoxes(length) {
+       const container = document.getElementById('spelling-container');
+       container.innerHTML = '';
+       
+       for (let i = 0; i < length; i++) {
+         const box = document.createElement('div');
+         box.className = 'letter-box';
+         box.dataset.index = i;
+         container.appendChild(box);
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // 更新字母框
+     function updateLetterBoxes() {
+       const boxes = document.querySelectorAll('.letter-box');
+       const input = gameState.userInput;
+       
+       // 重置所有框
+       boxes.forEach(box => {
+         box.textContent = '';
+         box.classList.remove('filled');
+       });
+       
+       // 填充输入的字母
+       for (let i = 0; i < input.length; i++) {
+         if (i < boxes.length) {
+           boxes[i].textContent = input[i];
+           boxes[i].classList.add('filled');
+         }
+       }
+       
+       // 更新提交按钮状态
+       const submitBtn = document.getElementById('submit-btn');
+       submitBtn.disabled = input.length !== boxes.length;
+     }
+     
+     // 处理按键输入
+     function handleKeyInput(key) {
+       const currentLevel = gameState.shuffledLevels[gameState.currentLevel];
+       const maxLength = currentLevel.word.length;
+       
+       if (key === 'backspace') {
+         // 删除最后一个字符
+         if (gameState.userInput.length > 0) {
+           gameState.userInput = gameState.userInput.slice(0, -1);
+         }
+       } else if (key === 'submit') {
+         // 提交答案
+         if (gameState.userInput.length === maxLength) {
+           checkAnswer();
+         }
+       } else if (key === 'hint') {
+         // 显示提示
+         showHint();
+       } else {
+         // 添加字符
+         if (gameState.userInput.length < maxLength) {
+           gameState.userInput += key;
+         }
+       }
+       
+       // 更新UI
+       updateLetterBoxes();
+     }
+     
+     // 检查答案
+     function checkAnswer() {
+       const currentLevel = gameState.shuffledLevels[gameState.currentLevel];
+       const correctAnswer = currentLevel.word;
+       const userAnswer = gameState.userInput;
+       
+       if (userAnswer.toUpperCase() === correctAnswer.toUpperCase()) {
+         // 答案正确
+         gameState.correctCount++;
+         
+         // 显示正确反馈
+         const boxes = document.querySelectorAll('.letter-box');
+         boxes.forEach(box => {
+           box.style.borderColor = '#2CCE89';
+           box.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(44, 206, 137, 0.1)';
+         });
+         
+         // 延迟后进入下一关
+         setTimeout(() => {
+           gameState.currentLevel++;
+           loadLevel();
+         }, 1000);
+       } else {
+         // 答案错误
+         gameState.lives--;
+         document.getElementById('lives-count').textContent = gameState.lives;
+         
+         // 显示错误反馈
+         const boxes = document.querySelectorAll('.letter-box');
+         boxes.forEach(box => {
+           box.classList.add('error');
+         });
+         
+         // 显示正确答案
+         setTimeout(() => {
+           gameState.userInput = correctAnswer;
+           updateLetterBoxes();
+           
+           // 延迟后进入下一关或结束游戏
+           setTimeout(() => {
+             if (gameState.lives > 0) {
+               gameState.currentLevel++;
+               loadLevel();
+             } else {
+               showResults();
+             }
+           }, 2000);
+         }, 1000);
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // 显示提示
+     function showHint() {
+       const hintBubble = document.getElementById('hint-bubble');
+       const hintText = document.getElementById('hint-text');
+       const currentLevel = gameState.shuffledLevels[gameState.currentLevel];
+       
+       hintText.textContent = currentLevel.hint;
+       hintBubble.classList.remove('hidden');
+       
+       gameState.hintsUsed++;
+     }
+     
+     // 播放发音
+     function playPronunciation() {
+       // 在实际应用中，这里会使用真实的发音API
+       // 在这个原型中，我们只是使用console输出
+       console.log(`播放单词：${gameState.shuffledLevels[gameState.currentLevel].word}`);
+       
+       // 添加音效反馈
+       const playBtn = document.getElementById('play-btn');
+       playBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-play text-white text-2xl"></i>';
+       
+       setTimeout(() => {
+         playBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-volume-up text-white text-2xl"></i>';
+       }, 1000);
+     }
+     
+     // 显示结果
+     function showResults() {
+       // 计算准确率
+       const accuracy = Math.round((gameState.correctCount / Math.min(levels.length, gameState.currentLevel + (gameState.lives === 0 ? 1 : 0))) * 100);
+       
+       // 更新结果弹窗
+       document.getElementById('passed-levels').textContent = gameState.correctCount;
+       document.getElementById('correct-count').textContent = gameState.correctCount;
+       document.getElementById('hints-used').textContent = gameState.hintsUsed;
+       document.getElementById('accuracy').textContent = `${accuracy}%`;
+       
+       // 根据得分设置不同的图标和颜色
+       const resultIcon = document.getElementById('result-icon');
+       if (accuracy >= 80) {
+         resultIcon.className = 'w-20 h-20 bg-green-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4';
+         resultIcon.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-trophy text-yellow-500 text-4xl"></i>';
+       } else if (accuracy >= 60) {
+         resultIcon.className = 'w-20 h-20 bg-blue-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4';
+         resultIcon.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-medal text-blue-500 text-4xl"></i>';
+       } else {
+         resultIcon.className = 'w-20 h-20 bg-orange-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4';
+         resultIcon.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-star text-orange-500 text-4xl"></i>';
+       }
+       
+       // 显示结果弹窗
+       document.getElementById('result-popup').style.display = 'flex';
+     }
+     
+     // 辅助函数：随机打乱数组
+     function shuffleArray(array) {
+       const newArray = [...array];
+       for (let i = newArray.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
+         const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
+         [newArray[i], newArray[j]] = [newArray[j], newArray[i]];
+       }
+       return newArray;
+     }
+     
+     // 绑定按钮事件
+     document.getElementById('play-btn').addEventListener('click', playPronunciation);
+     
+     document.getElementById('try-again-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       document.getElementById('result-popup').style.display = 'none';
+       initGame();
+     });
+     
+     // 绑定键盘按钮
+     document.querySelectorAll('.key').forEach(key => {
+       key.addEventListener('click', function() {
+         const keyValue = this.dataset.key;
+         handleKeyInput(keyValue);
+       });
+     });
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initGame);
+   </script>
+ </body>
+ </html> 
```

+       background: rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.1);
+       display: inline-flex;
+       align-items: center;
+       justify-content: center;
+       margin-left: 8px;
+       cursor: pointer;
+       transition: all 0.2s ease;
+     }
+     
+     .volume-btn:hover {
+       background: rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.2);
+     }
+     
+     .action-btn {
+       padding: 8px 16px;
+       border-radius: 20px;
+       font-size: 14px;
+       font-weight: 500;
+       cursor: pointer;
+       transition: all 0.3s ease;
+       display: inline-flex;
+       align-items: center;
+       justify-content: center;
+     }
+     
+     .action-btn i {
+       margin-right: 6px;
+     }
+     
+     .action-btn-primary {
+       background: linear-gradient(135deg, #7363E8, #6350E0);
+       color: white;
+       box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.3);
+     }
+     
+     .action-btn-primary:hover {
+       box-shadow: 0 6px 15px rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.4);
+       transform: translateY(-2px);
+     }
+     
+     .action-btn-primary:active {
+       transform: translateY(0);
+       box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.2);
+     }
+     
+     .action-btn-outlined {
+       border: 1px solid #7363E8;
+       color: #7363E8;
+       background: white;
+     }
+     
+     .action-btn-outlined:hover {
+       background: rgba(115, 99, 232, 0.05);
+     }
+   </style>
+ </head>
+ <body>
+   <div class="wx-container bg-light">
+     <!-- iPhone状态栏 -->
+     <div class="iphone-status-bar">
+       <div class="status-carrier">中国移动</div>

+           </a>
+         </div>

+             <i class="fas fa-comments text-green-500 mr-1"></i>
+             情景对话
+           </h1>

+         <div class="flex-none w-8"></div>

+       <!-- 进度显示 -->

+           <span class="text-sm text-gray-600">当前场景: <span class="font-medium text-gray-800">在餐厅</span></span>

+         </div>

+         <div class="progress-dots" id="progress-dots">
+           <!-- 进度点通过JavaScript动态生成 -->
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 翻译开关 -->
+       <div class="flex justify-end mb-3">
+         <div class="translation-toggle" id="translation-toggle">
+           <i class="fas fa-language text-indigo-500 mr-1"></i> 
+           <span>显示翻译</span>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 对话区域 -->
+       <div class="chat-container mb-6" id="chat-container">
+         <!-- 对话气泡通过JavaScript动态生成 -->
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 选项区域 -->
+       <div id="options-container" class="mb-6">
+         <!-- 选项通过JavaScript动态生成 -->
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 操作按钮 -->
+       <div class="flex justify-between mt-6">
+         <button id="prev-btn" class="action-btn action-btn-outlined" disabled>
+           <i class="fas fa-chevron-left"></i> 上一步
+         </button>
+         
+         <button id="next-btn" class="action-btn action-btn-primary" disabled>
+           下一步 <i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i>
+         </button>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- 结果弹窗 -->
+       <div id="result-popup" class="result-overlay">
+         <div class="result-card">
+           <div class="w-20 h-20 rounded-full bg-green-100 flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
+             <i class="fas fa-comments text-green-500 text-4xl"></i>
+           </div>
+           
+           <h2 class="text-xl font-bold mb-2">对话练习完成!</h2>
+           <p class="text-gray-600 mb-4">你成功完成了这个场景的对话练习</p>
+           
+           <div class="flex justify-between mb-6">
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">正确选择</div>
+               <div id="correct-count" class="font-bold text-lg text-green-500">0</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">总步骤</div>
+               <div id="total-count" class="font-bold text-lg">5</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="text-center flex-1">
+               <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">准确率</div>
+               <div id="accuracy" class="font-bold text-lg">0%</div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+           
+           <button id="practice-again-btn" class="wx-button wx-button-primary w-full mb-3 scale-on-press">
+             再练习一次
+           </button>
+           <a href="speech.html" class="wx-button wx-button-outline w-full block scale-on-press">
+             返回语音训练
+           </a>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- 底部导航 -->
+     <div class="fixed bottom-0 left-0 w-full nav-footer">
+       <div class="flex justify-around">
+         <a href="index.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-home"></i>
+           <span>首页</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="learning.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-book"></i>
+           <span>学习</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="games.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-gamepad"></i>
+           <span>游戏</span>
+         </a>
+         <a href="profile.html">
+           <i class="fas fa-user"></i>
+           <span>我的</span>
+         </a>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ 
+   <script src="../assets/js/main.js"></script>
+   <script>
+     // 更新状态栏时间
+     function updateStatusTime() {
+       const now = new Date();
+       const hours = now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       const minutes = now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       document.querySelector('.status-time').textContent = `${hours}:${minutes}`;
+     }
+     
+     // 初始更新时间并设置定时器每分钟更新一次
+     updateStatusTime();
+     setInterval(updateStatusTime, 60000);
+     
+     // 对话数据
+     const dialogueData = {
+       title: "在餐厅",
+       steps: [
+         {
+           type: "message",
+           character: "服务员",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-waiter.jpg",
+           message: "Good afternoon! Welcome to our restaurant. Do you have a reservation?",
+           translation: "下午好！欢迎光临我们的餐厅。您有预订吗？"
+         },
+         {
+           type: "options",
+           character: "你",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-user.jpg",
+           options: [
+             {
+               text: "Yes, I have a reservation for two people at 7 PM.",
+               translation: "是的，我预订了晚上7点两个人的位置。",
+               correct: true
+             },
+             {
+               text: "No, I don't like reservations.",
+               translation: "不，我不喜欢预订。",
+               correct: false
+             },
+             {
+               text: "What is a reservation?",
+               translation: "什么是预订？",
+               correct: false
+             }
+           ]
+         },
+         {
+           type: "message",
+           character: "服务员",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-waiter.jpg",
+           message: "Perfect! Let me show you to your table. Would you like to sit near the window?",
+           translation: "太好了！让我带您去您的餐桌。您想坐在靠窗的位置吗？"
+         },
+         {
+           type: "options",
+           character: "你",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-user.jpg",
+           options: [
+             {
+               text: "Yes, that would be lovely. Thank you.",
+               translation: "是的，那太好了。谢谢您。",
+               correct: true
+             },
+             {
+               text: "No, I hate windows and light.",
+               translation: "不，我讨厌窗户和光线。",
+               correct: false
+             },
+             {
+               text: "I want to sit on the ceiling.",
+               translation: "我想坐在天花板上。",
+               correct: false
+             }
+           ]
+         },
+         {
+           type: "message",
+           character: "服务员",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-waiter.jpg",
+           message: "Here's your table. Here are the menus. Can I get you something to drink while you look at the menu?",
+           translation: "这是您的餐桌。这是菜单。您看菜单时需要什么饮料吗？"
+         },
+         {
+           type: "options",
+           character: "你",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-user.jpg",
+           options: [
+             {
+               text: "I'd like a glass of water, please.",
+               translation: "我想要一杯水，谢谢。",
+               correct: true
+             },
+             {
+               text: "I never drink anything.",
+               translation: "我从不喝任何东西。",
+               correct: false
+             },
+             {
+               text: "Bring me all your drinks!",
+               translation: "把你们所有的饮料都给我拿来！",
+               correct: false
+             }
+           ]
+         },
+         {
+           type: "message",
+           character: "服务员",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-waiter.jpg",
+           message: "Here's your water. Are you ready to order, or do you need more time?",
+           translation: "这是您的水。您准备好点餐了吗，还是需要更多时间？"
+         },
+         {
+           type: "options",
+           character: "你",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-user.jpg",
+           options: [
+             {
+               text: "I think we need a few more minutes, please.",
+               translation: "我想我们还需要几分钟时间，谢谢。",
+               correct: true
+             },
+             {
+               text: "I'll have what that person is having!",
+               translation: "我要点那个人点的东西！",
+               correct: false
+             },
+             {
+               text: "I don't want to order. I just came here to sit.",
+               translation: "我不想点餐。我只是来这里坐坐的。",
+               correct: false
+             }
+           ]
+         },
+         {
+           type: "message",
+           character: "服务员",
+           avatar: "../assets/images/avatar-waiter.jpg",
+           message: "Of course, take your time. I'll be back in a few minutes.",
+           translation: "当然，请慢慢看。我一会儿再过来。"
+         }
+       ]
+     };
+     
+     // 游戏状态
+     let gameState = {
+       currentStep: 0,
+       selectedOption: null,
+       correctAnswers: 0,
+       showTranslation: false,
+       completedSteps: []
+     };
+     
+     // DOM元素
+     const chatContainer = document.getElementById('chat-container');
+     const optionsContainer = document.getElementById('options-container');
+     const progressDots = document.getElementById('progress-dots');
+     const nextBtn = document.getElementById('next-btn');
+     const prevBtn = document.getElementById('prev-btn');
+     const translationToggle = document.getElementById('translation-toggle');
+     const resultPopup = document.getElementById('result-popup');
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     function initGame() {
+       // 重置游戏状态
+       gameState = {
+         currentStep: 0,
+         selectedOption: null,
+         correctAnswers: 0,
+         showTranslation: false,
+         completedSteps: []
+       };
+       
+       // 更新UI
+       document.getElementById('current-step').textContent = '1';
+       document.getElementById('total-steps').textContent = Math.ceil(dialogueData.steps.length / 2);
+       
+       // 创建进度点
+       createProgressDots();
+       
+       // 加载第一步
+       loadStep();
+       
+       // 重置结果弹窗
+       resultPopup.style.display = 'none';
+     }
+     
+     // 创建进度点
+     function createProgressDots() {
+       progressDots.innerHTML = '';
+       const totalSteps = Math.ceil(dialogueData.steps.length / 2);
+       
+       for (let i = 0; i < totalSteps; i++) {
+         const dot = document.createElement('div');
+         dot.className = 'dot';
+         if (i === 0) dot.classList.add('active');
+         progressDots.appendChild(dot);
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // 更新进度点
+     function updateProgressDots() {
+       const dots = progressDots.querySelectorAll('.dot');
+       const currentDotIndex = Math.floor(gameState.currentStep / 2);
+       
+       dots.forEach((dot, index) => {
+         dot.classList.remove('active', 'completed');
+         
+         if (index < currentDotIndex) {
+           dot.classList.add('completed');
+         } else if (index === currentDotIndex) {
+           dot.classList.add('active');
+         }
+       });
+     }
+     
+     // 加载步骤
+     function loadStep() {
+       // 如果已经完成所有步骤，则显示结果
+       if (gameState.currentStep >= dialogueData.steps.length) {
+         showResults();
+         return;
+       }
+       
+       const step = dialogueData.steps[gameState.currentStep];
+       
+       // 更新进度
+       document.getElementById('current-step').textContent = Math.floor(gameState.currentStep / 2) + 1;
+       updateProgressDots();
+       
+       // 根据步骤类型显示不同内容
+       if (step.type === 'message') {
+         showMessage(step);
+         nextBtn.disabled = false;
+       } else if (step.type === 'options') {
+         showOptions(step);
+         nextBtn.disabled = true; // 需要选择选项后才能继续
+       }
+       
+       // 更新按钮状态
+       prevBtn.disabled = gameState.currentStep <= 0;
+     }
+     
+     // 显示消息
+     function showMessage(step) {
+       // 清空选项容器
+       optionsContainer.innerHTML = '';
+       
+       // 创建消息气泡
+       const messageElement = createChatBubble(step);
+       chatContainer.appendChild(messageElement);
+       
+       // 滚动到底部
+       chatContainer.scrollTop = chatContainer.scrollHeight;
+     }
+     
+     // 显示选项
+     function showOptions(step) {
+       // 首先显示角色消息气泡（空白）
+       const messageElement = createChatBubble({
+         character: step.character,
+         avatar: step.avatar,
+         message: '',
+         translation: ''
+       });
+       chatContainer.appendChild(messageElement);
+       
+       // 清空并创建选项
+       optionsContainer.innerHTML = '';
+       
+       step.options.forEach((option, index) => {
+         const optionCard = document.createElement('div');
+         optionCard.className = 'option-card';
+         optionCard.dataset.index = index;
+         
+         // 创建选项内容
+         const contentHTML = `
+           <div class="option-text">${option.text}</div>
+           <div class="translation-text">${option.translation}</div>
+           <div class="mt-2 flex justify-end items-center">
+             <div class="volume-btn">
+               <i class="fas fa-volume-up text-indigo-500 text-xs"></i>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         `;
+         
+         optionCard.innerHTML = contentHTML;
+         
+         // 添加点击事件
+         optionCard.addEventListener('click', () => {
+           selectOption(index);
+         });
+         
+         optionsContainer.appendChild(optionCard);
+       });
+       
+       // 如果启用了翻译，显示翻译文本
+       if (gameState.showTranslation) {
+         document.querySelectorAll('.translation-text').forEach(el => {
+           el.style.display = 'block';
+         });
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // 创建聊天气泡元素
+     function createChatBubble(data) {
+       const isRight = data.character === '你';
+       
+       const bubbleWrapper = document.createElement('div');
+       bubbleWrapper.className = `flex ${isRight ? 'justify-end' : 'justify-start'} mb-4`;
+       
+       // 创建头像和消息内容
+       const avatarHTML = `
+         <div class="character-avatar ${isRight ? 'order-2 ml-2' : 'mr-2'}">
+           <img src="${data.avatar || '../assets/images/avatar-default.jpg'}" alt="${data.character}" class="w-full h-full object-cover">
+         </div>
+       `;
+       
+       const bubbleHTML = `
+         <div class="${isRight ? 'order-1' : ''}">
+           <div class="character-name text-gray-500">${data.character}</div>
+           <div class="chat-bubble ${isRight ? 'chat-right' : 'chat-left'}">
+             <div class="message-text">${data.message}</div>
+             <div class="translation-text">${data.translation}</div>
+             ${data.message ? `
+               <div class="mt-2 flex justify-end items-center">
+                 <div class="volume-btn">
+                   <i class="fas fa-volume-up text-indigo-500 text-xs"></i>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+             ` : ''}
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       `;
+       
+       bubbleWrapper.innerHTML = isRight ? (avatarHTML + bubbleHTML) : (bubbleHTML + avatarHTML);
+       
+       // 添加点击事件到发音按钮
+       if (data.message) {
+         const volumeBtn = bubbleWrapper.querySelector('.volume-btn');
+         volumeBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
+           playPronunciation(data.message);
+         });
+       }
+       
+       // 如果启用了翻译，显示翻译文本
+       if (gameState.showTranslation && bubbleWrapper.querySelector('.translation-text')) {
+         bubbleWrapper.querySelector('.translation-text').style.display = 'block';
+       }
+       
+       return bubbleWrapper;
+     }
+     
+     // 选择选项
+     function selectOption(index) {
+       // 获取当前步骤和选项
+       const step = dialogueData.steps[gameState.currentStep];
+       const selectedOption = step.options[index];
+       
+       // 更新选项样式
+       const optionCards = optionsContainer.querySelectorAll('.option-card');
+       optionCards.forEach((card, i) => {
+         card.classList.remove('selected', 'correct', 'incorrect');
+         
+         if (i === index) {
+           card.classList.add('selected');
+           
+           // 显示正确或错误
+           if (selectedOption.correct) {
+             card.classList.add('correct');
+           } else {
+             card.classList.add('incorrect');
+           }
+         } else if (step.options[i].correct) {
+           // 如果当前选中的不是正确答案，则突出显示正确答案
+           if (!selectedOption.correct) {
+             card.classList.add('correct');
+           }
+         }
+       });
+       
+       // 更新游戏状态
+       gameState.selectedOption = index;
+       
+       // 如果是正确答案，增加正确计数
+       if (selectedOption.correct) {
+         gameState.correctAnswers++;
+       }
+       
+       // 更新选中的选项文本到空白气泡
+       const lastBubble = chatContainer.lastElementChild;
+       const messageTextElement = lastBubble.querySelector('.message-text');
+       if (messageTextElement) {
+         messageTextElement.textContent = selectedOption.text;
+       }
+       
+       const translationTextElement = lastBubble.querySelector('.translation-text');
+       if (translationTextElement) {
+         translationTextElement.textContent = selectedOption.translation;
+       }
+       
+       // 启用下一步按钮
+       nextBtn.disabled = false;
+     }
+     
+     // 下一步
+     function nextStep() {
+       gameState.currentStep++;
+       gameState.selectedOption = null;
+       loadStep();
+     }
+     
+     // 上一步
+     function prevStep() {
+       if (gameState.currentStep > 0) {
+         // 移除最后一个或两个气泡（根据当前是消息还是选项）
+         const currentStep = dialogueData.steps[gameState.currentStep];
+         if (currentStep.type === 'options') {
+           // 移除选项气泡
+           chatContainer.removeChild(chatContainer.lastElementChild);
+         } else {
+           // 如果当前是消息，前一步必然是选项，所以需要移除两个气泡
+           chatContainer.removeChild(chatContainer.lastElementChild);
+           if (chatContainer.lastElementChild) {
+             chatContainer.removeChild(chatContainer.lastElementChild);
+           }
+         }
+         
+         // 更新游戏状态
+         gameState.currentStep--;
+         gameState.selectedOption = null;
+         
+         // 加载前一步
+         loadStep();
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // 切换翻译显示
+     function toggleTranslation() {
+       gameState.showTranslation = !gameState.showTranslation;
+       
+       // 更新翻译开关文本
+       translationToggle.innerHTML = `
+         <i class="fas fa-language text-indigo-500 mr-1"></i> 
+         <span>${gameState.showTranslation ? '隐藏翻译' : '显示翻译'}</span>
+       `;
+       
+       // 更新所有翻译文本的可见性
+       document.querySelectorAll('.translation-text').forEach(el => {
+         el.style.display = gameState.showTranslation ? 'block' : 'none';
+       });
+     }
+     
+     // 播放发音
+     function playPronunciation(text) {
+       // 在实际应用中，这里会使用真实的发音API
+       // 在这个原型中，我们只是使用console输出
+       console.log(`播放发音：${text}`);
+     }
+     
+     // 显示结果
+     function showResults() {
+       // 计算准确率
+       const totalQuestions = Math.ceil(dialogueData.steps.length / 2);
+       const accuracy = Math.round((gameState.correctAnswers / totalQuestions) * 100);
+       
+       // 更新结果弹窗内容
+       document.getElementById('correct-count').textContent = gameState.correctAnswers;
+       document.getElementById('total-count').textContent = totalQuestions;
+       document.getElementById('accuracy').textContent = `${accuracy}%`;
+       
+       // 显示结果弹窗
+       resultPopup.style.display = 'flex';
+     }
+     
+     // 事件绑定
+     nextBtn.addEventListener('click', nextStep);
+     prevBtn.addEventListener('click', prevStep);
+     translationToggle.addEventListener('click', toggleTranslation);
+     
+     document.getElementById('practice-again-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
+       // 清空聊天容器
+       chatContainer.innerHTML = '';
+       
+       // 重新初始化游戏
+       initGame();
+     });
+     
+     // 初始化游戏
+     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initGame);
+   </script>
+ </body>
+ </html> 
```

---

+   <script src="../assets/js/main.js"></script>
+   <script>
+     // 更新状态栏时间
+     function updateStatusTime() {
+       const now = new Date();
+       const hours = now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       const minutes = now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0');
+       document.querySelector('.status-time').textContent = `${hours}:${minutes}`;
+     }
+     
+     // 初始更新时间并设置定时器每分钟更新一次
+     updateStatusTime();
+     setInterval(updateStatusTime, 60000);
+     
+     // 对话数据
+     const dialogueData = {

+           translation: "这是您的餐桌。这是菜单。您看菜单时需要什么饮料吗？"
+         },

+           type: "options",
+           character: "你",
